plot: The childhood of Margot fades amid twisted irons and only certainty that remains is that we are all dying.
title: A Infância de Margot
plot_es: The childhood of Margot fades amid twisted irons and only certainty that remains is that we are all dying.
plot_en: The childhood of Margot fades amid twisted irons and only certainty that remains is that we are all dying.
